message: I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product, which I believe will bring immense value to your business. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. Can you meet me at this price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, but I'm afraid I can't quite meet you at $1200000. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I get a fair price. How about we meet at $1350000?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go above $1200000. Can you meet me at this price?
